markdownRemark.html: This will hopefully be the first of many posts on various concepts in ML. I love working with on tensor-based models such as neural networks given the vast amount of applications, incredible performance, the room for new ideas and an immense community around it.

frontmatter.title: Capsule Networks
frontmatter.description: Neural networks with high-dimensional building blocks.
